mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(point),0) FROM wish_log WHERE mid = #{mid} AND status != -1

SELECT t1.id,t1.wid,t1.point,t1.status,t2.img,t2.title,t2.content,t2.needPoint,t2.unit,t2.unitType,date_format(t1.updatedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updatedAt,t1.amount FROM wish_log as t1 ,wish as t2 WHERE t1.wid = t2.id and t2.mid = #{mid} ORDER BY t1.createdAt DESC
SELECT * FROM wish_log WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY createdAt DESC
SELECT * FROM wish_log WHERE wid = #{wid} ORDER BY createdAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish_log (mid, uid, wid, point,info,unitType,amount,unit) VALUES (#{mid}, #{uid}, #{wid}, #{point}, #{info}, #{unitType}, #{amount}, #{unit})

SELECT w.title as name, COUNT(*) as count FROM wish_log l JOIN wish w ON l.wid = w.id WHERE l.mid = #{mid} -- AND l.status IN (0, 1, 2) AND l.createdAt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY l.wid, w.title ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
